  • Constructor Details

    • FireworkEffect

      public FireworkEffect(boolean flicker, boolean trail, FireworkEffectType type, List<Color> color, List<Color> fadeColor)
      Initializes a new firework effect.
      Parameters:
      flicker - true if this explosion has the Twinkle effect (glowstone dust), otherwise false.
      trail - true if this explosion hsa the Trail effect (diamond), otherwise false.
      type - The shape of this firework's explosion.
      color - The primary colors of this firework effect.
      fadeColor - The secondary colors of this firework effect.

  • Method Details

    • fromCompound

      public static FireworkEffect fromCompound(@NotNull @NotNull org.jglrxavpok.hephaistos.nbt.NBTCompound compound)
      Retrieves a firework effect from the given compound.
      Parameters:
      compound - The NBT connection, which should be a fireworks effect.
      Returns:
      A new created firework effect.

    • getFlicker

      public byte getFlicker()
      Whether the firework has a flicker effect.
      Returns:
      1 if this explosion has the flicker effect, otherwise 0.

    • getTrail

      public byte getTrail()
      Whether the firework has a trail effect.
      Returns:
      1 if this explosion has the trail effect, otherwise 0;

    • getType

      public byte getType()
      Retrieves type of the firework effect.
      Returns:
      The firework type as a byte.

    • getColors

      public int[] getColors()
      Retrieves array of integer values corresponding to the primary colors of this firework's explosion.

      If custom color codes are used, the game renders is as "Custom" in the tooltip, but the proper color is used in the explosion.

      Returns:
      An array of integer values corresponding to the primary colors of this firework's explosion.

    • getFadeColors

      public int[] getFadeColors()
      Retrieves array of integer values corresponding to the fading colors of this firework's explosion.

      Same handling of custom colors as Colors.

      Returns:
      An array of integer values corresponding to the fading colors of this firework's explosion.

    • asCompound

      public org.jglrxavpok.hephaistos.nbt.NBTCompound asCompound()
      Retrieves the FireworkEffect as a NBTCompound.
      Returns:
      The firework effect as a nbt compound.
